properties.Name: ProductCoverage
properties.Description:
The types of coverage available to the associated Insurance product.

The Coverage Liability and Coverage Deductible define the associated coverage.

Columns.Name: ProductId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Product.

Columns.Name: InsuranceCoverageTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Insurance Coverage Type.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period start date that the associated coverage type is effective.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period end date that the associated coverage type is effective.

Columns.Name: ProductCoverageStatement
Columns.Description: The insurance product statement defining the coverage .

Columns.Name: OptionalCoverageIndicator
Columns.Description: Indicates that the associated coverage type is optional for the Product.

Properties.Description:
The types of coverage available to the associated Insurance product.

The Coverage Liability and Coverage Deductible define the associated coverage.
